Marietta.Pine Mountain (Cobb County, Georgia):
Pine Mountain is a natural geographical feature located in Cobb County, Georgia, near the town of Kennesaw.


== Geography ==
Pine Mountain is located at approximately 33°59'21.13" up North, 84°38'43.00" West. The small "mountain" has an approximate elevation of 1292 feet or 394 meters above sea level.
